How to Get the intersection Point(s) between a line segment with a given (Start, End) points (P1, P2) as PointLatLng and the circle center (P3) with radius (R) in kilometers.

The solution should be one of three cases:

1 - No intersection (No Solution).
2 - One intersection point.
3 - Two intersection points.

Thanks

hello;
That's a math problem, you should relay on line and circle equations according to a reference (P3 for example), and then solve the problem.
do not think about the map, make a model in a paper, and use geo coordinates in that they will be more accurate than pixel based coordinates.

hello;
Did you consider a reference point ?
  • Circle equation (x-a)² + (y-b)² = R² where a , b are coordinates of the circle center, if you take the center as a reference, then a=b=0.
  • For units used it does not matter, since the intersection results are calculated as ammounts to be placed relaively from the center(reference), and if you provide R in pixels, then results are in pixels.
